info.title: Business Rules
info.description: AI-powered business rules management. Enables businesses to define, manage, and receive AI-generated suggestions for rules that guide AI agent behavior across categories like tone of voice, business policies, things to avoid, and FAQ.

category.description:
The category of the business rule.

Available values:
* tone_of_voice - Rules about communication style and tone
* business_policies - Rules about business operations and policies
* things_to_avoid - Rules about what the AI should not do or say
* faq - Frequently asked questions and their answers

content.description: The content/text of the business rule
content.example: Always use a friendly and professional tone

sort_order.description: Sort order for displaying rules within a category

error.description: Error message if the operation failed

Bearer.description: Provide a valid bearer token in the Authorization header. Example: 'Authorization: Bearer {app_token}'

post.description:
## Overview
Approve a pending suggestion. This will apply the suggested change to the business rules:
* **create** suggestions create a new rule
* **update** suggestions modify the existing rule
* **delete** suggestions remove the existing rule

**Available for Staff Tokens**.
